data.text:
Suncoast Remake Learning Days Radio Camp | Saturday, April 20 | 10 a.m.-1 p.m. | Free Event

Note: Radio Camp is limited to the first 9 registrants.

Register Here

The Suncoast Remake Learning Days Radio Camp at WSLR LP 96.5 FM offers an exciting opportunity for 11- to-18-year-olds and their families to dive into the world of radio broadcasting and share their voices with the community.

Throughout the camp, participants will engage in various activities aimed at sparking their creativity, teaching essential radio skills, and fostering an understanding of the ethos of community radio.

Suncoast Remake Learning Days is supported by The Patterson Foundation.
